column1: Description: The proportion of local government revenue that is funded through donor funding, by district
Source: Local Government Budgets - Ministry of Finance, Planning and Economic Development
On the 'Data-wide-value' sheet, we have provided the indicator in a wide format. The values you see listed there are from the 'value' column.
